bonus.value: Equipping this matrix on the current weapon increases crit damage by 13%/16%/19%/23% and shatter by 13%/16%/19%/23%.

Equipping 2 or more weapons of different elements or types increases all elemental damage by 9.5%/11.5%/13.5%/15.5%. The effect is also active in the off-hand slot, but only the set with the highest star rating will take effect.
